titles.title: I Will Not Let You Go Until You Bless Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will not let You go until you bless me.
I will not let You go until you bless me.
Bless me, oh Lord. Bless me, oh Lord.
I will not let You go until you bless me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Rend the veil of the flesh in me.
Rend the veil of the flesh in me.
Face to face, I will see You.
Rend the veil of the flesh in me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
No te dejo ir hasta que me bendigas. (2x)
Bendiceme Señor, bendiceme Señor.
No te dejo ir hasta que me bendigas.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Rompe el velo de la carne en mi. (2x)
Bendiceme Señor, bendiceme Señor.
No te dejo ir hasta que me bendigas.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Cara a cara quiero verte. (2x)
Bendiceme Señor, bendiceme Señor.
No te dejo ir hasta que me bendigas.
